election_record.label: Vermont 1821 Governor

sub_unit.name: Addison
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns lists 1133 votes for Richard Skinner in Addison County; however, the sum of totals per town is 1122.

sub_unit.name: Warren
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns lists 44 votes for Richard Skinner in Warren.

sub_unit.name: Sheffield
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns lists 77 votes for Richard Skinner in Sheffield.

sub_unit.name: Chittenden
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns tally sheet lists 653 votes for Richard Skinner in Chittenden; however, the sum of totals per town is 699.

sub_unit.name: Brunswick
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns lists 19 votes for Richard Skinner in Brunswick.

sub_unit.name: Granby
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Granby.

sub_unit.name: Lunenburg
sub_unit.note: The Lunenburg Town Records lists 56 votes for Richard Skinner.

sub_unit.name: Berkshire
sub_unit.note: The Journal of the Vermont General Assembly reports 2 scattering votes in Berkshire.

sub_unit.name: Franklin
sub_unit.note: According to the Franklin Town Records, 85 freemen voted.

sub_unit.name: Georgia
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns and The Journal of the Vermont General Assembly report 8 votes for Richard Skinner and 2 scattering votes in Berkshire.

sub_unit.name: Sterling
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Sterling.

sub_unit.name: Orleans
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns lists 440 votes for Richard Skinner in Orleans Coumty; however, the sum of totals per town is 459.

sub_unit.name: Albany
sub_unit.note: The votes from Albany were rejected.

sub_unit.name: Coventry
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Coventry.

sub_unit.name: Hyde Park
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Hyde Park.

sub_unit.name: Westfield
sub_unit.note: The Westfield Town Records does not list any votes for Richard Skinner.

sub_unit.name: Sherburne
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Sherburne.

sub_unit.name: Fayston
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Fayston.

sub_unit.name: Northfield
sub_unit.note: The Northfield Town Records does not list any votes for Richard Skinner, only one vote for Dudley Chase.

sub_unit.name: Windsor
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns lists 1849 votes for Richard Skinner in Windsor County; however, the sum of totals per town is 1857.

sub_unit.name: Andover
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Andover.

sub_unit.name: Baltimore
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Baltimore.

sub_unit.name: Bridgewater
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Bridgewater.

sub_unit.name: Stockbridge
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns lists 52 votes for Richard Skinner in Stockbridge.

election_record.reference: Original Election Returns. Vermont State Archives, Middlesex.
Journal of the Vermont General Assembly, 1821. 187-190.
Vermont Republican and American Yeoman (Windsor, VT). October 22, 1821.
Vermont Intelligencer, and Bellows Falls Advertiser (Bellows Falls, VT). October 29, 1821.
Fairbanks, Edward Taylor. The Town of St. Johnsbury VT: a review of one hundred and twenty-five years to the anniversary pageant 1912. St. Johnsbury, VT: The Cowles Press, 1914. 571.
Phelps, James Houghton. Collections Relating to the History and Inhabitants of the Town of Townshend, Vermont. Townshend, VT: G.E. Selleck, 1877. 229.
